title: The Ten Commandments Repeated
summary: Deuteronomy 5 restates the Ten Commandments, reminding Israel of their covenant at Mount Sinai. Moses urges the people to fear God and obey Him so that they may live long and prosper in the land.

faq.question: Why are the Ten Commandments repeated?
faq.answer: To remind the new generation of God's covenant and expectations.

faq.question: How did the people react when God spoke at Sinai?
faq.answer: They were afraid and asked Moses to speak to God on their behalf.
